column5: Has anybody been there in the last couple of yeasr? I went about 10 yrs ago and it was everything was very good(fishing,food,service) but I heard last fall it was open but for sale. We are considering a trip this year still. Thanks in advance. Go Cards
Not for sale. Every thing is still good.
They still had a booth at the All Canada Show. I can't imagine they would go through that travel if they were selling.

Just wanted to verify we are certainly open and had a great year this 2011. Made many large improvements to the grounds and of course, fishing is still superb. Call anytime. 800 946 8244 and thank you for your time

The Kabeelo Airways base is on Confederation Lake, right near Uchi. I've flown over Uchi several times on trips to Jeannette and Wakeman and have always wondered about the fishing. I'm sure it's excellent as most of the lakes up there are.
Hi There:I know for a fact that Uchi Lake is not for sale. If anything, their upgrades have been spectacular. Fishing is probably better than when you were there 10 years ago. Good luck.
You might want to give Uchi a try. The fishing is tremendous thanks to the owner's conservation policies. The owners really care about their guests and tend to every detail imaginable.
